TopicTitle: Perfect Career Salvage Mission with Stock build Space Shuttle

Articles.Content:
Hi all

This is why i love this Game, but see for yourself, and... ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

![NEJycpq.png](http://i.imgur.com/NEJycpq.png)

After researching the new parts and the new Aero, Chiefengineer Bill (he is well again after his crazy Lawnmower accident...) build this Space Shuttle, there is not much to say about it, its almost perfect in any situation. Took about 20 hours of testing the construction.

![LOWHsMl.png](http://i.imgur.com/LOWHsMl.png)

Gently inserting Orbit and dettaching Main Tank. OMS propulsion with onboard stored LFO, enough to fool around alot in Kerbin Orbit.

![tLBP9Ez.png](http://i.imgur.com/tLBP9Ez.png)

Intercepting the Nuclear waste, Valentina is Commander of the "Kerminger" Space Shuttle Salvage Mission. Preparing the CLAW to grab the Spacejunk and deorbit this dangerous Piece away from harming other Kerbonauts.

![k8lb2D3.png](http://i.imgur.com/k8lb2D3.png)

Perfect RCS Handling, a expert Copilot does the Job while Valentina is preparing for a short EVA to investigate the source of this Pollution, to send an invoice to the former owner of the LV-N atomic rocket crap...

![FXlBKph.png](http://i.imgur.com/FXlBKph.png)

Valentina successfully investigated the factory plate on the LV-N, also happy of successfully cleaning up LKO.

![MUR6Agx.png](http://i.imgur.com/MUR6Agx.png)

Overshooting descent, but no problem for the "Kerminger" Shuttle, it falls down like a concrete Flower crate, but very stable and nicely. Blasting off a bit LFO in Atmosphere to make a nice turn to the opposite side of KSP runway, approaching without a single problem.

![KrahSow.png](http://i.imgur.com/KrahSow.png)

Gently landing the Shuttle at Runway 27, Bobby is a four Star Pilot, peanuts for him. Mission completed after 1 hour and 19 minutes. Perfect!

![BATGYCj.png](http://i.imgur.com/BATGYCj.png)

Parking to dissembark the Crew, preparing to recover the Spacejunk.

![GPM7ZJ3.png](http://i.imgur.com/GPM7ZJ3.png)

Honestly, if i had to rate this game, i would give 100 Points of 100. Its the biggest fun in my lifetime in PC gaming... Its gorgeous. SQUAD you are the BEST. Really ![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif).

If someone likes to have the craftfile...

Here you are:[https://www.dropbox.com/s/uh8jffevk6uuttz/Space%20Shuttle%20KERMINGER.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/uh8jffevk6uuttz/Space%20Shuttle%20KERMINGER.craft?dl=0)

Take a close look at anything, then you see its not so difficult to make a NASA style Shuttle carrier.

I had to tweak anything, also thrust limiters and offsetting the wings, RCS,... 

When you start, engage SAS, set throttle to 2/3, then slightly throttle up until staging the Boosters, then make a nice gravity turn to your liking, engage RCS, throttle down while depleting the main tank, stage it off, switch to OMS manouvermotors (Actiongroup 2, 1 shuts down the main thrusters ), open shuttle tanks, finish Orbitinsertion, now you have alot of dV left to do what you wanna do. It starts eastwards, no rollmanouver needed like the original... when descending keep some liquids at the front and balance it if necessary, so that it makes a nice level flight. If falling can be considered "level Flight" at all ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif).

No really, this one is just great in handling. It has a dockingport on the the top up like the real ones had sometimes.

Take a look at the actiongroups.
